title: Soul Collector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grow stronger as more people die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever anyone dies, you collect a soul, getting stronger.
- If somebody comes back from the dead, you do not lose a soul.
- If a resurrected player dies again, you do not get a new soul.

fields.name: The benefits of souls are:
fields.value:
- 0: Nothing
- 1: Basic Defense
- 2: Basic Attack
- 3: Powerful Attack
- 4-6: Powerful Defense
- 7-8: Target 2 people
- 9: Unstoppable Attack
- 10: Rampage
- 11: Your vote secretly counts as 3
- 12: Invincible Defense

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 582
*"People ask me all the time, 'What do you do with your souls?' Well, I collect them, like trading cards. Some of these souls are worth a lot of money, but not soul 733 and 1074, those are worth 2 cents."*
